"素材そのままの持ち味を活かして

"I want you to go to all sorts of places and find wonderful things."
"Hmm... You aren't yet experienced enough to begin gathering."
"Please come back once you have completed \"Free Exploration: Forest\". I'll be waiting for you."

"ともあれ、ジェネさんが

"今度一緒に釣りに行きましょうって

"おはようございまーす。

"そうじゃなくて？

"そう言うことなら
ちょっぴりお手伝いして

"アークスなら誰でも作れる
フォトンを使った

"また何かあったら来てくださいねー。

"Are you having fun with the fall harvest? If you have any questions, feel free to ask me."
"...Hmm, has anyone harvested a girl dressed for Halloween recently?"
"I don't think so. It's true that gathering uses tools to embody fluctuations in space-time..."
"The closest thing to Halloween I can think of would be a Caves Pumpkin. Oh, I heard an interesting story about that!"

"They say that on Halloween night, those pumpkins grow eyes, a mouth and legs...
Um, does that help?"

"いろいろな場所に行って
その景色を楽しめること。

"I want you to go to all sorts of places and find wonderful things."

"ギャザラーの魅力の一つが

"I want you to go to all sorts of places and find wonderful things."

"ギャザリングをすると

"手を動かして何かを採ったり釣ったり
